tool_description: This API helps to query for football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey matches, leagues, news, etc... to create a sporting site/application such as livescore.com
name: LiveScore_v2
title: LiveScore

api_list.name: matches/v2/detail (Deprecated)
api_list.description:
Get detail information of a match
*The default timezone currently is UTC+7

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live endpoints

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

optional_parameters.name: LiveTable
optional_parameters.description: true|false - Whether or not include live table relating to current match

api_list.name: news/v2/list-by-sport
api_list.description: List news relating to a specific sport by category

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The value of categories -> id JSON object returned in .../news/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: matches/v2/list-live
api_list.description:
List available live matches at request time
* Base for Img field is https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium . Ex : https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium/enet/9906.png

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-innings
api_list.description: Get innings of a match (for "cricket" as category)

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-h2h
api_list.description: Get head to head information in the past

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-table
api_list.description: Get table

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-scoreboard
api_list.description: Get scoreboard of a match

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-info
api_list.description: Get where the match takes place

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

api_list.name: teams/get-team-stats
api_list.description: Get team statistics relating to a competition

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description:
The value of ID field returned in .../competitions/detail, .../matches/v2/list-by-date, .../matches/v2/list-by-league, .../matches/v2/list-live 
OR Tid field returned in  ../get-table endpoint

api_list.name: teams/get-player-stats
api_list.description: Get players statistics relating to a competition

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description:
The value of ID field returned in .../competitions/detail, .../matches/v2/list-by-date, .../matches/v2/list-by-league, .../matches/v2/list-live 
OR Tid field returned in  ../get-table endpoint

optional_parameters.name: Type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Goals|3-Assists|8-Shots on target|4-Red cards|6-Yellow cards

api_list.name: teams/get-table
api_list.description: Get table of a team

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description:
The value of ID field returned in .../competitions/detail, .../matches/v2/list-by-date, .../matches/v2/list-by-league, .../matches/v2/list-live 
OR Tid field returned in  ../get-table endpoint

api_list.name: teams/detail
api_list.description: Get team information, recent and up coming matches

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description:
The value of ID field returned in .../competitions/detail, .../matches/v2/list-by-date, .../matches/v2/list-by-league, .../matches/v2/list-live 
OR Tid field returned in  ../get-table endpoint

api_list.name: competitions/get-team-stats
api_list.description: Get teams statistics in a competition

required_parameters.name: CompId
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages -> CompId field returned in .../leagues/v2/list or .../leagues/v2/get-table or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-live endpoint

optional_parameters.name: Type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 10-goals scored|7-Goals conceded|1-Average possession|21-Shots on target|22-Total shots|16-Red cards|23-Yellow cards

api_list.name: competitions/get-player-stats
api_list.description: Get players statistics in a competition

required_parameters.name: CompId
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages -> CompId field returned in .../leagues/v2/list or .../leagues/v2/get-table or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-live endpoint

optional_parameters.name: Type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Goals|3-Assists|8-Shots on target|4-Red cards|6-Yellow cards

api_list.name: competitions/get-table
api_list.description: Get table relating to a competition

required_parameters.name: CompId
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages -> CompId field returned in .../leagues/v2/list or .../leagues/v2/get-table or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-live endpoint

api_list.name: competitions/detail
api_list.description: Get competition information, recent and up coming matches

required_parameters.name: CompId
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages -> CompId field returned in .../leagues/v2/list or .../leagues/v2/get-table or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-live endpoint

api_list.name: matches/list-by-league (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: league
required_parameters.description: The value of Ccd field at top level that responded in leagues/list API

api_list.name: matches/get-table (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get table of related match

required_parameters.name: p
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages/Events/IDs/p field responded in .../matches/list-by-league or .../matches/list-by-date or .../matches/list-live endpoint

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of Stages/Events/IDs/ID field responded in .../matches/list-by-league or .../matches/list-by-date or .../matches/list-live endpoint

api_list.name: matches/v2/list-by-date
api_list.description:
List all matches by specific date
* Base for Img field is https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium . Ex : https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium/enet/9906.png

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: Date
required_parameters.description: The date string with following format yyyyMMdd

api_list.name: matches/detail (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get detail information of a match

required_parameters.description: The value of Stages/Events/IDs/ID field responded in .../matches/list-by-league or .../matches/list-by-date or .../matches/list-live endpoint

required_parameters.name: category

api_list.name: matches/v2/get-lineups
api_list.description: Get match line-ups

required_parameters.name: Eid
required_parameters.description: The value of Eid field returned in .../matches/v2/list-by-league or .../matches/v2/list-by-date or .../matches/v2/list-live or .../competitions/detail endpoint

api_list.name: news/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all news of specific category

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Pass empty for init request, or value of key field returned right in this API to load the next records

api_list.name: news/v2/list
api_list.description: List latest news relating to all sports at once
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://livescore6.p.rapidapi.com/news/v2/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "livescore6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://livescore6.p.rapidapi.com/news/v2/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "livescore6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: news/v2/detail
api_list.description: Get news content

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of articles -> id field returned in .../news/v2/list or .../news/v2/list-by-sport

api_list.name: matches/v2/list-by-league
api_list.description:
List all matches by specific league and table
* Base for Img field is https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium . Ex : https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium/enet/9906.png

required_parameters.name: Category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.name: Ccd
required_parameters.description: The value of Ccd field that responded in .../leagues/v2/list or .../matches/v2/list-by-date endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: Scd
optional_parameters.description: The value of Scd field that responded in .../leagues/v2/list or .../matches/v2/list-by-date endpoints.

api_list.name: matches/list-live (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List available live matches at request time

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

api_list.name: matches/list-by-date (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all matches by specific date

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date string with following format yyyy-MM-dd

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

api_list.name: leagues/v2/list

List all leagues by category (football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey)

Get table league by category (football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey) and competition

required_parameters.description: One of the followings : soccer|cricket|basketball|tennis|hockey

required_parameters.description: The value of Scd field returned in .../leagues/v2/list endpoint
